definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Once workaholism sets in, it progresses through stages like those in taking drugs.
sentences.chinese: 一旦犯了工作狂的毛病，其發展過程類似於吸毒。

sentences.english: Being a workaholic can actually hurt your business.
sentences.chinese: 當一個工作狂會損害你的事業。

sentences.english: Pursue the dedication and hard-working spirit of a delicated worker.
sentences.chinese: 像工作狂一樣的職業追求和奮鬥精神。

sentences.english: You are a workaholic, what kind of sense of proprietary do you have?
sentences.chinese: 你是個工作狂，你能有什麼分寸？

sentences.english: Q. How can workaholism harm a company?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼工作狂會傷害到公司？

sentences.english: The complete opposite to the lazy slob is the type A overachiever.
sentences.chinese: 跟懶散男完全相反的是工作狂男。

sentences.english: Research show that workaholism tends to distance us from our immediate families.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，工作狂往往使我們與家人的關係疏遠。

sentences.english: Readers: Where do you fall on a workaholism scale?
sentences.chinese: 讀者們，你什麼時候陷入過工作狂的狀態？

sentences.english: This sign is the original workaholic.
sentences.chinese: 摩羯座是天生的工作狂。

sentences.english: Q. Is technology making workaholism worse?
sentences.chinese: 科技會使工作狂更糟嗎？

sentences.english: I am workaholic, very romantic an really emotional.
sentences.chinese: 我是個工作狂，但是我也非常浪漫，易動感情。

sentences.english: Q. What's the difference between workaholism and working very hard?
sentences.chinese: 工作狂與工作十分賣力差別何在？

sentences.english: Q. Are certain types of people more prone to workaholism than others?
sentences.chinese: 某些類型的人比其他人更容易變成工作狂？

sentences.english: If you happen to be a workaholic, chances are you may not even know it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你恰好是一個工作狂，很可能你自己也不知道。

sentences.english: In fact, she said, workaholism can harm the company as well as the worker.
sentences.chinese: 其實工作狂會傷害到公司以及員工。

definition: brave man, willing to risk his life
Mr Goody-goody/yes-man (sb who agrees with anything)
a good wife and loving mother
Capricorn (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
to take care of one's family
(said of sb else's wife) a good wife
